snippet.title: Playing Every Apple II Floppy E243 | inadvertently going for the run
snippet.description:
Taking a quick look at Lazer Silk, a 1982 release for the Apple II: controls, mechanics, gameplay, and how to play.

💾 Download disk image or play in-browser: https://archive.org/details/wozaday_Lazer_Silk
🔇 Commentary-free version: https://youtube.com/watch?v=bT8kUjNhix8

This is episode 243 of Woz A Day, my series where I'm taking a look at Apple II software in the "WOZ" disk image format uploaded to the Internet Archive "Woz A Day" collection in upload order: https://archive.org/details/wozaday
These are preservation-quality unmodified/uncracked disk images that can pass copy-protection checks and preserve the original "retail" experience.

Woz A Day Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXVtlqgyC7v2ACowTpMXcMrLbfX1qdBHE

Thumbnail photograph by Blake Patterson.
